name: colin lyons
text: it has really goooood food. The service is great as well. One downside is delivering takes forever or sometimes they get lost. One time my dad had to get out of the house to direct the pizza man.

name: Stephen Roach
text: Clean food was solid you're typical papa Gino's .

name: mlee
text: Pizza overcooked. Asked to have it cooked properly but didn’t listen. Also the pizza I got was cut into squares!!! Why was it cut into squares?? I didn’t ask for that! Pizza is supposed to be eaten in triangle shape. I never asked to be cut into squares!

name: Scott Boyd
text: I eat about once a week. Hot, correct and good. Really good manager Robin...she trains help well. Clean

name: Chuck D
text: Luv this place.. best service.. food is always great..

name: John Eifert
text: Came in a few weeks ago on a monday night with my sons entire soccer team without any notice, there was in total about 20 people. The manager ( didnt catch his name, I believe he was early 20,s ) on shift was excellent, accommodating us and …More

name: Kara Naticchioni
text: Food is good. Employees need more direction. Food is usually delayed due to issues but they're still very nice

name: Naveen Sajjan
text: I'd give negative stars if I could. These people doesn't take allergies seriously despite of the requests made. We stopped at this place for a bite on the way to airport but instead ended up in ER at Charles MGH. Had to pull over on rt.3 and administer epipen to my 7 yr old.

name: Michael Ferrara
text: If you need to satisfy a particular kind of craving, I have found this Papa Gino's to be one of the best choices for Pizza in Westford.  The crust and toppings are fantastic!  I can definitely satisfy my appetite on a budget  with a quick visit to Papa Gino's in Westford.

name: A E
text:
The time I told them to make my pizza well done they Burned it after waiting extra 20 mis from the actual pick up time.
The 2nd time I asked for delivery, my kids and I got stomach infection from their pizza. Diarrhea and throwing up. Never again!

name: Bettiann Cardoza
text: I am on the high way and called a simple order in so I could pick up the pizza and go visit my granddaughters . I ordered one large pepperoni pizza and one gluten free crust no cheese with peppers . I got there and all they had was a gluten free pizza with cheese ! That was burnt .

name: Sarah Geoffroy
text: Always good food, never too busy

name: Bryce Burke
text: Very thick and undercooked crust on the pizza. I believe you can get sick from undercooked crust? Also the wings were pictured with barbecue sauce on the site, but came plain. A bit turned off.

name: Robert Jeffers
text: Stopped in for a quick lunch. Meatball sub was tasty and service was fast and friendly.

name: Nancy Rego
text: Cold steak and cheese. Bread was stale, worst sub I've had in a long time.

name: Dave Dugal
text: Basic flat pizza that's been the same acceptable quality for decades.

name: Zack Tziolis
text: Cannot even cook the pizza. Ordered two tonight both undercooked and took 50 mins to deliver. They actually brought two replacements and they were again undercooked. Don't waste your time or money.

name: Yatu Sabe
text: The service is terrible!!, everytime I walk in, no one is around to attend the customer, hence they have a loud bell that signals when a customer walks in!! One of the guys greeted me as he saw me walk in, I was just going to pick up and …More

name: Dean Parmenter
text: No better than any other papa ginos

name: John Ray
text: Pizza tasted like dish soap. Not good at all

name: Glenn Payne
text: Pizza was the worst that I have had.  Didn't eat any of it.

name: Joshua Rosen
text: Not terrible but not great.

name: Capt. Guac
text: Lied to twice and served a raw burger.

name: Alex Bartholi
text: Ok

name: Philip Marino
text: Amazing.

name: Eightbit87
text: Meh

name: Amy Fountain
text: Quick Service

name: Kara Richardson
text: Great food, great service, great pizza!!!!!!

name: Karen Obrien
text: disgusting

name: John M
text: Very good thin crust pizza

name: Meghan Frost
text: Deliveries are always late, ice cold and missing half the order!

name: Joel Cantos
text: quick and easy when in the plaza

name: Chris Adams
text: Place sucks. Don't go there if you want a shitty experience

name: Dorian Mohar
text:
Two slices and a drink, $7.89
Slices were cold
Very little cheese on my cheese pizza

name: Gabriel Kohen
text: Greasy oil dripping pizzas
